attributes.action: Introduce Voluntary Coalition (Normalised Politics) to Northern Ireland.
attributes.additional_details:
We the people of Northern Ireland call upon the Secretary of State (Karen Bradley) and Westminster to Introduce a normal political structure (voluntary coalition) in Northern Ireland, like in England, Scotland and Wales even the ROI.

Given the evidence that the RHI (the latest scandal) investigation has uncovered. It's clear Mandatory Coalition is a failure and that the current political system (Mandatory Coalition) is having a total negative effect on the lives of everyone, regardless of community or religion.

We should no longer be forced to endure a 2nd class system of government in NI.

We deserve a system of government capable of giving good government to all the people regardless of community or religion.
attributes.background: The current political setup (Mandatory Coalition) is a system of government unfit for purpose. Politics here in Northern Ireland shifts from crisis to crisis, from deadlock to deadlock and has collapsed on more than one occasion. It's time to normalise politics in NI (Introduce voluntary coalition)
